lead_paragraph: PATTERSON--Patricia S. Venetian Heritage mourns the loss of its founding board member Patricia S. Patterson. Her loyalty to us and love of Venice were exemplary. We will all miss her greatly. Pierre Durand, Chairman and President Mrs. Donald K. Miller, Vice Chairman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PATTERSON, PATRICIA S

snippet: PATTERSON--Patricia S. Venetian Heritage mourns the loss of its founding board member Patricia S. Patterson. Her loyalty to us and love of Venice were exemplary. We will all miss her greatly. Pierre Durand, Chairman and President Mrs. Donald K. Miller, Vice Chairman 1/3
